title: im so lucky
body:
playing vs priest as murloc/secret paladin.  priest thought steals tirion from me.  i somehow clear his board get past tirion and am winning pretty hard.  priest has 8 cards in deck, i have 3.  havent drawn 1 anyfin or tirion yet.  priest doubles his 4 hp minions hp twice then inner fires,  gets me to 7 hp with it.  

what do i draw with my 3 cards left?  2 of which just win?  solemn vigil...  i only have 2 minions on board to make it 3 mana, so i cant even play anything i draw from it.  lose game qq.
